content.text:
# 2001 Prince Edward Island Scott Tournament of Hearts

The 2001 Prince Edward Island Scott Tournament of Hearts was held January 19â€“23  at the Charlottetown Curling Club in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island. The winning team was Team Shelly Bradley who represented Prince Edward Island, finished with a 7-4 round-robin record, losing the tiebreaker for a place in the semi-finals at the 2001 Scott Tournament of Hearts in Sudbury, Ontario.
